title: METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new territory by focusing on delivering an all-new action experience unlike anything that has come before.  Combining world-class development teams at Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, MGR REVENGEANCE brings two of the world’s most respected teams together with a common goal of providing players with a fresh synergetic experience that combines the best elements of pure action and epic storytelling, all within the expansive MG universe.  The game introduces Raiden as the central character; a child soldier transformed into a half-man, half-machine cyborg ninja, equipped with a high-frequency katana blade and a soul fueled by revenge.

childDownloads.title: Blade Wolf
childDownloads.description: Play as the prototype LQ-84i, aka Blade Wolf as you battle countless enemies using your arsenal of weapons and abilities, culminating in an all-new boss battle.  Reactivated by Desperado Enforcement's leader Sundowner and serving under Mistral, reveal Blade Wolf’s story prior to him battling and eventually joining forces with Raiden. BUY IT NOW!

childDownloads.title: Custom Body for “Raiden” in “Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance”. A green design is used to mimic military fatigues.
childDownloads.description: Custom Body for “Raiden” in “Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance”. Green armor design is used to mimic military fatigues and includes increase in the amount of range weapons you can carry.

childDownloads.title: METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE Cyborg Ninja
childDownloads.description: Custom Body of “Raiden” for “Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance." The Cyborg Ninja design is based on Grey Fox from previous Metal Gear games and includes the powerful Fox Blade.

childDownloads.title: E3 2010 Press Briefing - Metal Gear Solid RISING (HD)
childDownloads.description: Watch the coolest new game trailers from E3 2010.

childDownloads.title: METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE Inferno Armor
childDownloads.description: Custom Body for “Raiden” in “Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance”. A red design is used to emphasize the usage of explosions and increase the amount of throwing weapons you can carry.

childDownloads.title: Jetstream
childDownloads.description: Featuring multiple hours of all new gameplay, play as Samuel Rodriguez, "the cool Brazilian wind", who brought terror and chaos to the underworld in Latin America as a lone swordsman. Unaffiliated with any organization, Sam slashed his way through the world’s outlaws as part of his training, and has now arrived in Denver, Colorado. What did he see in the world's biggest private military corporation, "World Marshall", when he challenged the organization? Reveal his past and BUY IT NOW!!!

Combining world-class development teams at Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, MGR REVENGEANCE brings two of the world’s most respected teams together with a common goal of providing players with a fresh synergetic experience that combines the best elements of pure action and epic storytelling, all within the expansive MG universe. childDownloads.title: METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE MGS4 Raiden Custom Body
childDownloads.description: Custom Body of “Raiden” for “Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance." The MGS4 Raiden Custom Body design is based on the Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots version of Raiden.

childDownloads.title: VR Mission Expansion
childDownloads.description: Push Raiden’s Cyborg body to its limits with 30 all-new VR/Virtual Reality missions, featuring that classic VR look inspired by the original Metal Gear Solid: VR Missions. Featuring a mix of combat training, tactical maneuvering, stealth-based approaches and more, these missions will both provide practice in which to hone your skills in original stages not seen the in the game’s campaign. And, in an interesting twist, you’ll be able to take control of the Dwarf Gekko in the VR Missions for an entirely unique experience. Buy Now!
